@rainersigwald, the scoped ref change went in 6 days ago, yet this failed after /azp run 3 days ago. Is something else wrong? The problem looks similar.
That is confusing and I don't repro locally. Trying again.
Azure Pipelines successfully started running 1 pipeline(s).

(Failed again)

Want me to try to figure this out today?
Merge conflicts with NuGet, and this isn't urgent, so I'm going to close this and let it trigger anew next week.
